snippet: Lawmakers said a survey of electronic cigarette producers found that hundreds of giveaways and sponsorships took place at youth-oriented events.
abstract: Investigation by Democratic members of Congress into marketing practices of electronic cigarette companies has found that major producers are targeting young people; inquiry was conducted as the Food and Drug Administration prepares a major package of tobacco control rules that would place e-cigarettes under federal regulation for the first time.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers said a survey of electronic cigarette producers found that hundreds of giveaways and sponsorships took place at youth-oriented events.

headline.main: E-Cigarettes Are Targeted at Youths, Report Says
headline.print_headline: E-Cigarettes Are Targeted at Youths, Report Says
